title: (x) This Month Poster Exhibition - Georgia {Marc O}
content:
Hi all   
Any ideas?   
Sorry for the small crappy image, it's all i've got, snapped from 'Spin's' UK site.   
   
Cheers ![font](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525174228im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/35134.gif)
author: jeremy_matthews

comments.content:
Reminds me of Jeremy Tankard's   
'Enigma' ( [http://www.typography.net/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525174228/http:/www.typography.net/))   
but not quite.

It's good old Georgia, designed by Matthew Carter for Microsoft. More info here:   
   
http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/font.aspx?FID=4&FNAME=Georgia

Ahh, right under my nose.   
Many thanks.
